title: A clinically-recommended MR whole lung imaging protocol using free-breathing 3D isotropic zero echo time sequence
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Qiuxi Lin, Cheng Cheng, Yingying Bao, Weiyin Vivian Liu, Lei Zhang, Zhaofeng Cai, Qi Wan, Chongpeng Sun, Xinchun Li, Yu Deng
